document.full_text: 'the book of mormon,' a collaboration between the creators of 'south park' and the composer of 'avenue q,' is that rare thing: an old-fashioned, pleasure-giving musical.
document.title: theater review | 'the book of mormon' : missionary men with confidence in sunshine
lines_and_colors: 'the book of mormon,' a collaboration between the creators of 'south park' and the composer of 'avenue q,' is that rare thing: an old-fashioned, pleasure-giving musical.
